item.title: Timely Transports (Part 4)
item.description:
Welcome to part 4 of the devlog! Let’s dive right in.

Second Playtest Session!

Fortunately, everything I explained above are indeed improvements to the game!

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 3)
item.description: Welcome to part 3 of the devlog. Finally, we get to test the first prototype/draft of the game!

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 2)
item.description:
Welcome to part 2 of the devlog! Let’s dive right in.

The First Version – Space Shenanigans?

With a strong idea about how such a game might work, I went on a hunt for simple gameplay ideas and accessible themes.

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 1)
item.description: Ever since inventing a new genre of board games (the One Paper Games), my mind has been overflowing with ideas for innovative types of games.
